newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary 1-mo, 3-mo BUBOR flat, 6-mo edges down. [CORRECTED 11:29 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Hungary 1-mo, 3-mo BUBOR flat, 6-mo edges down. [CORRECTED 11:29 GMT]

text.p: Hungary's Budapest Interbank Offered Rates (BUBOR) remained steady for one-month and three-month maturities and eased for the six-month, the National Bank of Hungary (NBH) said on its BUBOR Reuters page on Thursday.
The one-month rate was set at 21.28 percent, the three-month rate at 21.15 percent, both unchanged. The six-month rate was at 21.01 percent (corrects figure from 21.011), down from 21.02.
